title: Equatorial Guinea fully implements voluntary production adjustment commitments
description: Vienna, Austria, 18 May 2020--Equatorial Guinea announced that it has fully adjusted its oil production in accordance with its commitment to oil market stability and the agreements reached at the 9th and 10th (Extraordinary) OPEC and non-OPEC Ministerial Meetings held on 9 and 12 April respectively, via videoconference.
